item.description:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“humza”)){
yell(“humza has Logged in. Watch out!”);

this says that humza has logged in watch out do i have to copy and paste the code below and just change the name will that work? and

can anyone give me a command for ::giveadmin, ::givemod for pwnscape 377 source can u make sure that only i can do the command thanks.

and also can anyone tell me that i have the files and my hoster has the files and he runs it and the same time how could both of our files get edited? thanks.
